titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a charitable contribution deduction for certain expenses incurred by whaling captains in support of Native Alaskan subsistence whaling.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2303-2304)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/29/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a charitable deduction for expenses of a whaling captain (recognized by the Alaska Eskimo Whaling Commission) in carrying out subsistence bowhead whale hunting activities.
